group_1.textRight: Who the hell would do something like this?!
[chara:102250:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]―!?
I'm really, really sorry... Miss "Nami"...
We've been in the same group... all this time...

group_1.textLeft: It can't be...YOU'RE our sixth member?

group_1.textRight: Eh?! You were the one who first responded to@her request?

group_1.textLeft: You're smaller than my brother... Does that mean@you're in elementary school?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: Hey... what exactly was the point in doing all@those horrible things?

group_1.textRight: You guys aren't really friends, are you?
It's no fun pretending to be all buddy-buddy.@It's so shallow, you know?
Don't you guys want to be more true to@yourselves?
So I decided I would show everyone the truth...@All the truth. All of it, all of it, all of it!

group_1.textLeft: All the things you posted on our accounts...@those photos you submitted...

group_1.textRight: Everything I did, I did for you.
Everything, everything, everything... I'm gonna@destroy everything!
Every illusion! Every fake friendship, fake@memory, fake everything!
I'm gonna tell everyone the truth!
I'm gonna tell them that "Nami" and her so-called@friends all hate each other!

group_1.textLeft: Of course we all hate each other! Duh! We know@that waaaay better than you ever could!
But it's not like saying that will help our case any.
We're the ones stuck with this crap, so we'll@have to resolve it ourselves.

group_1.textRight: Everything... Everything...

group_1.textCenter: Just because you're in elementary school doesn't@mean you're off the hook!

group_1.textLeft: Rena, wait! Take a close look at him!

group_1.textCenter: Oh... Shoot, it's a Witch's Kiss!

group_1.textLeft: I had the feeling something was off, but I didn't@realize it was a Witch...

group_1.textRight: If all this was a Witch's doing, though, that's a@good thing!

group_1.textLeft: We spent all day building up this relationship...@we spent so much time on this project...
And that Witch tried smashing it all to bits!
The only way I'm gonna feel better about this is@if I smash her face in!

group_1.textRight: The Labyrinth is that way!

group_1.textLeft: Let's go! I'm gonna wreck her six ways to Sunday!

group_1.textRight: Same here!

group_1.textLeft: I'll pulverize her with my own two hands...!

group_1.textRight: Like, I get why you're all annoyed, but can you@guys PLEASE chill out...?!
